title: @Riot Veigar's Final Boss skin splash art
body:
Look closely. The "Q" doesn't look... *quite* like a Q...

Maybe do something about it before it goes live? Please? o.o

replies.body: PSH. Having the little notch going in the correct direction is for chumps.

HAHAHA This is funny, They should make a joke about this. Start making one thing messed up in every splash art

R.I.P OCD's
Oopsie. I had to stare at it for a long while before I caught it. Happens to even the most professional artists.
maybe they had to do this because of copyright issues
